info.name: Creedtng Backend API - Production Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for Creedtng backend. Includes implemented endpoints and proposed endpoints for missing APIs requested by product spec.

item.name: Auth - User
item.description: User authentication and account management APIs.

request.description: Register a new user account.
Authenticate user and return access/refresh tokens.
Exchange refresh token for new access and refresh tokens.
Request password reset email. Always returns generic success message.

response.name: Success

request.description: Reset password using reset token.
Change password for authenticated user.
Delete currently authenticated user account.
Authenticate admin and return access/refresh tokens.

item.name: User
item.description: User self-service APIs. Some endpoints are proposed because they are missing in current backend implementation.

request.description: Proposed endpoint: fetch current authenticated user profile.
Proposed endpoint: update current authenticated user profile.
Proposed endpoint: get current user subscription status.
Proposed endpoint: list available subscription plans.
Create a subscription for authenticated user. Implemented endpoint.
Proposed endpoint: validate/apply coupon before subscription checkout.
Proposed endpoint: get authenticated user active subscription.
Send a message to AI coach. Requires user token.

response.name: Success

request.description: Fetch last 50 chat records for authenticated user.
Submit a support/issue report as authenticated user.

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
  "_id": "65f0c4d5e8b9f120ab34cd59",
  "user": "65f0c4d5e8b9f120ab34cd56",
  "issueType": "billing",
  "description": "I was charged twice for the same monthly subscription payment.",
  "contactInfo": "john@example.com",
  "status": "open",
  "createdAt": "2026-02-18T11:00:00.000Z",
  "updatedAt": "2026-02-18T11:00:00.000Z"
}

request.description: Proposed endpoint: get reports created by authenticated user.

response.name: Success

item.name: Admin - Dashboard
item.description: Admin analytics and financial dashboard APIs.

request.description: Implemented via overview endpoint. Read totalUsers from response.
Implemented via overview endpoint. Read activeSubscriptions from response.
Get aggregated revenue grouped by plan type.
Implemented via overview endpoint. Read monthlyRevenue array from response.
List users with pagination.
Get user details by user id.

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
  "_id": "65f0c4d5e8b9f120ab34cd56",
  "name": "John Doe",
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "role": "user",
  "height": 175,
  "weight": 72,
  "goals": "Lose fat and build endurance",
  "subscriptionStatus": "premium",
  "isBlocked": false,
  "createdAt": "2026-01-11T05:00:00.000Z",
  "updatedAt": "2026-02-18T06:00:00.000Z"
}

request.description: Block a user account.
Unblock a user account.
List subscriptions with pagination.
Get subscription details by id.
Create a new coupon.
Update coupon values by id.
Delete coupon by id.
List all coupons.
Enable/disable coupon by id. Additional implemented endpoint.
List all submitted reports.

response.name: Success

item.name: Admin - CMS
item.description: CMS content APIs for Terms, Privacy Policy, and About Us.

request.description: Get public terms content.
Upsert terms content (admin only).
Get public privacy policy content.
Upsert privacy policy content (admin only).
Get public about-us content.
Upsert about-us content (admin only).
Additional implemented endpoint: list all CMS entries.

response.name: Success
